testcase.classname: API_US32 As an administrator (admin), I should be able to update the finding category information registered in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: API_US32_TC01_ValidAuth_SuccessStatus_RecordUpdateValidation
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/updateFindingCategory" path parameters.............passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing 143 and "ill category 1" information to send to the api Finding Category endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed * The api user verifies that the "updateId" information in the Response body is the same as the id information in the patch request body..passed
